description: FLKB files are referred to as Basic Lockers. Folder Lock also supports Portable Lockers ( .FLKA extension), which have a 4GB file size limit. While Portable Lockers can be backed up using NewSoftware's online backup service, Basic Lockers cannot.
NOTE: FLKB and FLKA files were introduced with version 7 of Folder Locker. Previous software versions use .FLK files for lockers.
